name: Hellforged
description:
This was a quick summer project I was working on. The game is based around fast platforming using abilities which only recharge when you use them to kill an enemy.

Controls

Arrow keys/Left Thumbstick - Move

Space/A button - Jump

Z/ X button - Uppercut

X/ Y button - Dash

C/ B button - Lunge 

Credits: 

Backgrounds by Szadi Art https://szadiart.itch.io/pixel-fantasy-caves
